title: Descriptions: Art (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Art subcategory within Descriptions. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.romaji: Kono e wa sugoi desu ne.
cards.japanese: この絵はすごいですね。

cards.english: She painted a picture with delicate brushstrokes.
cards.romaji: Kanojo wa sensai na fudetsukai de e o kakimashita.
cards.japanese: 彼女は繊細な筆遣いで絵を描きました。
